requestParams.name: status
requestParams.desc: 仓库欲变更的状态 0:启用 1:停用

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['warehouse_id']=23602002
params['status']=0
params['retail_source']="test"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.warehouse.status.update', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
